item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "We can only be what we give ourselves the power to be." -- Obert Skye

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "There is no relationship in life that comes with the promise of zero pain." -- Obert Skye

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "there is no moment more precious than the exact moment you are living now" -- Obert Skye

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "impossible is not a word" -- Obert Skye

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Sometimes when I'm talking, my words can't keep up with my thoughts. I wonder why we think faster than we speak. Probably so we can think twice." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Hobbes: Do you think there's a God? Calvin: Well, somebody's out to get me!" -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I think hiccup cures were really invented for the amusement of the patient's friends." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You know, sometimes kids get bad grades in school because the class moves too slow for them. Einstein got D's in school. Well guess what, I get F's!!!" -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "We're so busy watching out for what's just ahead of us that we don't take time to enjoy where we are." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
Troi-Anne add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "There's never enough time to do all the nothing you want." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "Terry was beside himself. Not literally. This story would be that much more painful if there were two Terrys, able to stand next to each other and simultaneously curse Leven." -- Obert Skye

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "I am what I am because I have made myself so." -- Obert Skye

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Lloyd Alexander
item.description: "Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it." -- Lloyd Alexander

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "I write to give myself strength. I write to be the characters that I am not. I write to explore all the things I'm afraid of. " -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club." -- Jack London

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Maureen Johnson
item.description: "I ran like a thing that runs." -- Maureen Johnson

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Susan Ee
item.description: "It is painful to see that people prefer a bad guy who looks like an angel to a good guy who looks like a demon." -- Susan Ee

item.title: Troi-Anne add a quote by Susan Ee
